name: On Christmas Night
description:
A visual novel based on a short literary work by the russian writer Anton Chekhov. It tells the story of a young woman waiting for her husband to return from a fishing trip during the Christmas Eve.

Available for Windows, Linux and Mac OS. An Android version will also be available, but at a later date.
If you need contact information, you can find it in the game :)

Added languages:

-English

-Russian

-Spanish (90%)

And yes, you can click on the name in the game, by the way.
